ygData.subject: Re: New instrument?!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i am pretty sure the screen shot of cazic thule was a joke, supposedly a friend of mine claimed a friend of his did it as a joke... everybody understood it
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:22 AM 9/2/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
>Hmmm I remember seeing a screen shoot of Cazic Thule and he was holding a
>flute like instrument. Maybe this is it, but a Horn of War would seem more
>appropriate to Rallos Zek then Cazic Thule.
>
>Rokenn
>

i am pretty sure the screen shot of cazic thule was a joke, supposedly a
friend of mine claimed a friend of his did it as a joke... everybody
understood it to be a joke anyways. =)
I did see Cazic holding duel maces once... we all joked it was two rusty
maces but you should have seen the clerics drool. Zone crashed right before
we killed him for the second time... first time he dropped a total of 8
platinum. Which is why the two rusty maces was expected :)

All this was prenerf btw, we cant even kill one mob now in the fear plane.
Has any server even managed to kill one mob in the fear plane since it was
nerfed?


Gendal Concorden
